RelatedSentence: A lawyer was allegedly shot dead on Monday morning by four unidentified persons who were later lynched by a mob at Kheri Gani village in Muzaffarnagar , police said .
Sanjiv Malik , former general secretary of Budhana Bar Association was shot dead over an old enmity , SSP HN Singh said .
Tension prevailed in the village after an irate mob lynched the four accused and security has been tightened in the area , he said .

RelatedSentence: The accused have not been identified yet , police said adding , further investigations are on .
